message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if you'd prefer something else.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be realistic, time is ticking and the value is decreasing. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 is too much in your favor. I propose a 40/60 split, which is closer to a fair compromise.
